overview: Lily is only 17 who lives and breathes Falconry.  She has started training her new Kestrel Sid. It's the beginning of a lifelong journey and a bond created through nothing but love and trust. Falconry has given Lily a purpose in life and the film captures her personal growth as she develops her skills to care for Sid. Watch Lily catch her first kill, paint a watercolour and prepare hand made lures all for her love of Sid.
title: Lily
